eu.bavenir.vicinity.gatewayapi.restapi.services

Class Adapters

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.restlet.resource.Resource
      • org.restlet.resource.ServerResource
        • eu.bavenir.vicinity.gatewayapi.restapi.services.Adapters

  • public class Adapters
extends org.restlet.resource.ServerResource
    This class implements a ServerResource interface for following Gateway API calls: URL: [server]:[port]/api/adapters METHODS: GET, POST SPECIFICATION: @see Gateway API
    Author:
    sulfo

      • represent

        @Get
public java.lang.String represent()
        Returns the list of the adapters.
        Returns:
        All VICINITY identifiers of all adapters.

      • accept

        @Post(value="json")
public java.lang.String accept(org.restlet.representation.Representation entity)
        Registers new adapter.
        Parameters:
        entity - Representation of the incoming JSON.
        description - Description of the new Adapter.
        Returns:

      • getAdapters

        private java.lang.String getAdapters()
        Returns the list of the adapters.
        Returns:
